metadata.name: Local Groups Discovery - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects enumeration of local system groups. Adversaries may attempt to find local system groups and permission settings

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/groups')) OR (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/cat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/head')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/tail')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/more'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/group'))))

output.summary: Detects enumeration of local system groups. Adversaries may attempt to find local system groups and permission settings

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1069.001/T1069.001.md
